event_text: m_c was grabbed and dropped by an eagle, but {PRONOUN/m_c/subject} somehow survived.

history_text.reg_death: m_c died from {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} wounds after an eagle grabbed {PRONOUN/m_c/object}.

event_text: m_c was running over the hills, when {PRONOUN/m_c/subject} tripped over {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} own legs and hit the ground hard.

m_c trips over an unseen rabbit hole, spraining {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} paw.

m_c is feeling extremely sore from the long distances {PRONOUN/m_c/subject}{VERB/m_c/'ve/'s} run lately.

event_text: m_c was out wandering the territory for a bit too long and came back with frostbite.
m_c fell into a river, and inhaled a lot of water before managing to get out. {PRONOUN/m_c/subject/CAP}{VERB/m_c/'ve/'s} been hacking and sputtering ever since.
